\begin{document}

    
    
\subsection*{Contents}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item Generate the B.M
   \item Inizialitation
   \item Compute Equity using GBM
\end{itemize}
\begin{verbatim}
function    SimEquity=EquitySimulation(N,S0,fwd,sigma,T)
\end{verbatim}
\begin{verbatim}
%function that simulate the equity using the GBM model

% OUTPUT : vector of the simulated equity per year

% INPUT:
%N:      Number of samples
%S0:     Equity at time t=0
%sigma:  Volatility
%fwd:    forward from the EOPIA
%T:      Period
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{Generate the B.M}

\begin{verbatim}
dt=1;
dW = sqrt(dt)*randn(N,T);
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{Inizialitation}

\begin{verbatim}
SimEquity=zeros(N,T+1);
SimEquity(:,1)=S0;
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{Compute Equity using GBM}

\begin{verbatim}
for t=2:T+1
SimEquity(:,t) = SimEquity(:,t-1).*exp( (fwd(t-1)-0.5*sigma^2)*dt+sigma*dW(:,t-1));
end

SimEquity = mean(SimEquity,1)';
\end{verbatim}
\begin{verbatim}
end
\end{verbatim}



\end{document}
